name: Feed the Flame(s)
description:
You have just made a bonfire in wildernis where mountains are looming in the distance.   Now you want to keep it alive, no matter the cost.

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • E, R, F, T or P to pick up and drop items except for gasoline (they all do the same)
  • 1, 2 and 3 to make time (and you) run faster
There are two things you can strive for:
  1. Making the most simultaneous flames.
  2. Keeping the fire alive for the longest amount of time

Programming was done by me. Art was done by my two younger sisters.
